1.name: The Shawshank Redemption
1.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

2.name: Pulp Fiction
2.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

3.name: Forrest Gump
3.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

4.name: Léon
4.description: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. Léon and Mathilda form an unusual relationship, as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

5.name: The Lion King
5.description: A Lion cub crown prince is tricked by a treacherous uncle into thinking he caused his father's death and flees into exile in despair, only to learn in adulthood his identity and his responsibilities.

6.name: Stargate
6.description: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

7.name: Dumb and Dumber
7.description: The cross-country adventures of 2 good-hearted but incredibly stupid friends.

8.name: Natural Born Killers
8.description: Two victims of traumatized childhoods become lovers and psychopathic serial murderers irresponsibly glorified by the mass media.

9.name: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
9.description: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.

10.name: The Mask
10.description: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

11.name: D2: The Mighty Ducks
11.description: Gordon Bombay is forced to withdraw from the minor hockey league with a knee injury. Much to his surprise, he is given the job of coach of Team USA Hockey for the Junior Goodwill Games in ...                See full summary »

12.name: The Crow
12.description: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.

13.name: Legends of the Fall
13.description: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

14.name: The Little Rascals
14.description: Alfalfa is wooing Darla and his "He-Man-Woman-Hating" friends attempt to sabotage the relationship.

15.name: True Lies
15.description: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.

16.name: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
16.description: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

17.name: Speed
17.description: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

18.name: Four Weddings and a Funeral
18.description: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

19.name: Clerks
19.description: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

20.name: Clear and Present Danger
20.description: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

21.name: Little Women
21.description: The March sisters live and grow in post-Civil War America.

22.name: The Flintstones
22.description: In this live-action feature of the cartoon show, Fred Flintstone finally gets the job he's always wanted, but it may just come at a price.

23.name: Street Fighter
23.description: Col. Guile and various other martial arts heroes fight against the tyranny of Dictator M. Bison and his cohorts.

24.name: Heavenly Creatures
24.description: Two teenage girls share a unique bond; their parents, concerned that the friendship is too intense, separate them, and the girls take revenge.

25.name: Shallow Grave
25.description: Three friends discover their new flatmate dead but loaded with cash.

26.name: The Client
26.description: A young boy who witnessed the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him when the District Attorney tries to use him to take down a mob family.

27.name: Color of Night
27.description: A color-blind psychiatrist Bill Capa is stalked by an unknown killer after taking over his murdered friend's therapy group, all of whom have a connection to a mysterious young woman that Capa begins having intense sexual encounters with.

28.name: Star Trek: Generations
28.description: With the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, Captain Picard must stop a renegade scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter a space matrix.

29.name: Ed Wood
29.description: Ambitious but troubled movie director Edward D. Wood Jr. tries his best to fulfill his dreams, despite his lack of talent.

30.name: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert
30.description: Two drag performers and a transgender woman travel across the desert to perform their unique style of cabaret.

31.name: Disclosure
31.description: A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.

32.name: In the Mouth of Madness
32.description: An insurance investigator begins discovering that the impact a horror writer's books have on his fans is more than inspirational.

33.name: Chung Hing sam lam
33.description: Two melancholy Hong Kong policemen fall in love: one with a mysterious female underworld figure, the other with a beautiful and ethereal server at a late-night restaurant he frequents.

34.name: The Jungle Book
34.description: Rudyard Kipling's classic tale of Mowgli, the orphaned jungle boy raised by wolves, and how he becomes king of the jungle.

35.name: Frankenstein
35.description: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

36.name: Muriel's Wedding
36.description: A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.

37.name: Once Were Warriors
37.description: A family descended from Maori warriors is bedeviled by a violent father and the societal problems of being treated as outcasts.

38.name: Wyatt Earp
38.description: The story of Wyatt Earp as he interacts and battles other famous figures of the Wild West era.

39.name: Little Giants
39.description: Misfits form their own opposing team to an elite peewee football team, coached by the elite team coach's brother.

40.name: Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult
40.description: Frank Drebin comes out of retirement to help Police Squad infiltrate a gang of terrorists planning to detonate a bomb at the Academy Awards.

41.name: Angels in the Outfield
41.description: When a boy prays for a chance to have a family if the California Angels win the pennant, angels are assigned to make that possible.

42.name: Maverick
42.description: Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.

43.name: Sirens
43.description: When a painting is termed blasphemous, a young minister and his wife visit the artist... and the three sexually playful models living with him.

44.name: Trois couleurs: Rouge
44.description: A model discovers her neighbor is keen on invading people's privacy.

45.name: The War
45.description: Vietnam War vet Stephen Simmons must deal with a war of a different sort between his son and their friends, and a rival group of children. He also must deal with his own personal and ...                See full summary »

46.name: Reality Bites
46.description: A documentary filmmaker and her fellow Gen X graduates face life after college, looking for work and love in Houston.

47.name: The Return of the Texas Chainsaw Massacre
47.description: A group of teenagers get into a car crash in the Texas woods on prom night, and then wander into an old farmhouse that is home to Leatherface and his insane family of cannibalistic psychopaths.

48.name: Ri¢hie Ri¢h
48.description: A rich young boy finds his family targeted in an inside job and must use his cunning to save them.

49.name: Quiz Show
49.description: A young lawyer, Richard Goodwin, investigates a potentially fixed game show. Charles Van Doren, a big time show winner, is under Goodwin's investigation.

50.name: The Shadow
50.description: In 1930s New York City, the Shadow battles his nemesis, Shiwan Khan, who is building an atomic bomb.
